ygData.subject: Re: HELP!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: FYI on the SoL guide-- this is what I was sent from Amazon re: my pre-order of the
ygData.messageBody:
FYI on the SoL guide-- this is what I was sent
from Amazon re: my pre-order of the
guide:<br><br>*********************************************<br><br>"Greetings from Amazon.com!<br><br>We have contacted the
publisher by phone concerning the status of our <br>order
for "Everquest: Shadows of Luclin: Prima's Official
Strategy <br>Guide." <br><br>The representative that we
spoke with indicated that this book has not <br>been
published and is expected to be released December 18, 2001.
<br>Release dates tend to fluctuate, however, so there is a
chance that <br>this will change. If we receive
additional information about this, we <br>will let you
know."<br><br>************************************<br><br>So just has for it for X-mas Shoom--- and make sure
it's on the list of someone who is a last minute
shopper, as it may not hit the stores until just before
x-mas.<br><br>Xela
